授業目的: This course is to designed to give the student an overview of the approaches and methods in conducting business research.  It is focused on how to conduct research in various business issues.  We will discuss how to frame the research question, select variables and develop hypothesis.  We will also examine various methods for analyzing data.  Further, we will analyze research that is presented in academic journals  The student is expected to develop a proposal for his/her individual research project.
到達目標: Students will be able to explore research topics from their own interests, demonstrate research problems and questions, explore methodologies, and discuss an expected result of the study.  As a result, students will be able to present a research proposal for Individual Research.
